meanings: [명사] conceit, pride, self-importance, vanity, [동사] be vain, be big-headed

vlive.korean: 자만하지 말고 항상 항상! Don't be proud and always! 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : HAPPY MAY BIRTHDAY🎂
이거 너무 자만하는건가? Is this too conceited? 듣기 View video PENTAGON : ⭐펜타곤 2주년⭐
[내가 잠시 자만했어] 이렇게 보고 해야겠다. I should look at you and do it. 듣기 View video Golden Child : 골든차일드(Golden Child) “CH.GOL-CHA!” Ep.10
vlive.english: I should look at you and do it.

vlive.korean: [소파 취침자만 아는 눈물의 스토리] 열을 그냥 혼자서 돌려야 돼. I had to make heat on my own. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 김재중 스페셜 Ep.6
vlive.english: I had to make heat on my own.

vlive.korean: [다이어터의 상식 달걀은 흰 자만 섭취할 것] 아시죠 흰 자만 먹어야 된다는 거? You know, right? That you should only eat the egg whites? 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 1회]관리 만렙! 나르샤의 다이어트 식단!😜
vlive.english: You know, right? That you should only eat the egg whites?

examples.korean: a very conceited person 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자만심이 아주 많은 사람 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a very conceited person Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had no personal vanity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 외모에 대한 자만심이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had no personal vanity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’s a good driver, if a little over-confident. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 운전을 잘 한다. 좀 자만하기는 하지만. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s a good driver, if a little over-confident. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He started to chat to me and I could tell that he really fancied himself. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 나에게 이야기를 하기 시작했는데 나는 그가 정말 자만심에 차 있다는 걸 알 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He started to chat to me and I could tell that he really fancied himself. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s very conceited of you to assume that your work is always the best. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 하는 일이[당신 작품이] 항상 최고라고 생각한다면 그건 대단히 자만심에 찬 생각이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s very conceited of you to assume that your work is always the best. Add to Wordbook
